plugin_info.plugin_description:
Import a gdx results file into Hydra.
Written by Philipp Meier philipp@diemeiers.ch (c) Copyright 2014, University of Manchester.

arg.name: network
arg.help: ID of the network where results will be imported to. This coincides with the network exported to GAMS..

arg.name: scenario
arg.help: ID of the underlying scenario used for the most recent simulation run.

arg.name: gams-model
arg.help: Full path to the GAMS model (*.gms) used for the simulation.

arg.name: gams-path
arg.help: File path of the GAMS installation (the folder containing gams.exe or equivalent). This is only necessary if gams is installed in a non-standard location.
